sentence: It is as if who  cares if people lose their food assistance.
What does it mean when four people lose their coverage?
And when  he does that and the majority--the Republicans in Congress--allow this  to happen, how do the American people lose?

I hope I can eat my words because there is no joy in having a bill pass  and see people lose their doctors of choice, lose choice in health  plans because it is consolidating, lose choices in healthcare because  it is consolidating, and see their premiums skyrocketing.
Speaker, once that is undermined, then people lose faith in the  very institutions upon which this is built.
We can get prices down through deflation, if we go into a  recession, if you raise unemployment, allow unemployment to rise to  about 8 or 9 percent where people lose their jobs.
